DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of SP-02L monotherapy in Japanese patients with relapsed or refractory Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma (PTCL).
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study of SP-02L in Relapsed or Refractory Patients With Peripheral T-cell Lymphoma (PTCL)
DOC.criteria: Japanese patients aged â‰¥ 20 years of age at the day of obtaining the informed consent Patients with histologically confirmed diagnosis of the following: Peripheral Tcell Lymphoma, not otherwise specified (PTCLNOS) Anaplastic Large Cell Lymphoma (ALCL ALKpositive/negative) Angioimmunoblastic Tcell Lymphoma (AITL) Have relapsed or refractory to at least one prior systemic chemotherapy for the above disease (currently requiring therapy) Have at least 1 evaluable lesion Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0 to 2 Life expectancy of at least 3 months
